metadata.title: CVE-2024-10524 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: It has been discovered that when using the HTTP shorthand format withuser-provided input, unexpected behavior may occur. Wget might issue anFTP request to a different host - a potentially attacker-controlled hostor a restricted host which the user normally does not have access to. ThisSSRF vulnerability can be the starting point for many types of attacks.

criterions.comment: wget package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
